name: Shaq Fu
overview: As Shaq, use your lightning-fast shuriken and other martial mart techniques to prevail over 6 intensely evil warriors in the enforcement of justice. Or choose any of the 7 warriors and fight head to head. Summon Voodoo's bone shattering earthquake, rebound with Rajah's shockwave sword or lash out with Sett's terrifying mummy wrap. Scores of secret power moves to discover and master.
